name: Cloudlands: VR Minigolf
storyline:
Welcome to Cloudlands : VR Minigolf! Cloudlands is a virtual reality minigolf experience like you've never experienced before. Be transported to a beautifully landscaped island archipelago above the clouds with full support for both HTC Vive and Oculus Touch.

You will find no swing or power meters in Cloudlands. Cloudlands uses an intuitive 1:1 control mapping between the virtual putter and your Vive/Oculus Touch controller. Expect your real-life skills to translate into the virtual world (oh no!). Don't worry though. It's mini golf! Everyone can have fun and play.

Cloudlands includes one fantastical 18 hole course. The course is split between 3 different seasons so expect to see summer, autumn, and winter themed holes. Expect to be challenged by ball cannons, floating bridges, spinning obstacles, and multi-island holes. Fully equipped with local and global online leaderboards.
summary: Cloudlands is a VR minigolf experience transporting you to a beautifully landscaped course high above the clouds. Single player, online multiplayer, local multiplayer, and a course editor (coming soon) allow you to build, share, and play other user generated holes. No swing or power meters found here, simply swing the club to play.
